import React, { useContext, useE } from 'react' import IngredientList from './IngredientList' import { RecipeContext } from './App' export default function Recipe(props) { const { handleRecipeDelete } = useContext(RecipeContext) const { id, name, cookTime, servings, instructions, ingredients, } = props return (

{name}

Cook Time: {cookTime}
Servings {servings}
Instructions
{instructions}
Ingredient
) }
